headline: 4 Stocks Guy Spier Was Selling in Q4
summary: Guy Spier of Aquamarine Capital is an incredibly intelligent value investor who’s heavily influenced by the great Warren Buffett. Just have a look at the Aquamarine portfolio, and you’ll notice many Buffett stocks as well as names that the Oracle of Omaha probably would have liked. With Buffett now retired, perhaps it’s Guy Spier and ... 4 Stocks Guy Spier Was Selling in Q4

headline: A Look At American Express (AXP) Valuation As White House Rate Cap Proposal Raises Investor Concerns
summary: The White House proposal to cap credit card interest rates at 10% has put American Express (AXP) under a brighter spotlight, as investors weigh how tighter APR limits could reshape its lending economics and rewards model. See our latest analysis for American Express. The share price has softened recently, with a 1-day share price return of 3.45% decline and a 30-day share price return of 6.46% decline, as the White House rate cap proposal and upcoming January 30 earnings keep risk perceptions...
